attributes.action: Bring forward legislation to protect nurses in their work place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year lots of nurses are assaulted in their place of work and the police and the courts do very little about this. Therefore we call upon the government to introduce legislation to make it an offence to assualt a nurse in the course of her/his duty with punishments in line with those who assault police officers.
